system.description: When you have the right Surplus for a problem and spend it to solve the issue, describe how your resources resolve the situation without needing a roll.

success.label: Effect
success.value: Spend the appropriate Surplus. The problem is resolved efficiently and completely. Your family's resources prove their worth.

system.choices: Examples: Weaponry to win a fight, Engineering to build something, Scouts to find information, Leadership to rally people, Safety to protect against hazards
